name: Florence MASON, Petitioner v. Hon. Giovanni CAMPBELL, J.C.P., Christopher Boltinghouse, R. Seth Williams, Respondents

parties: Florence MASON, Petitioner v. Hon. Giovanni CAMPBELL, J.C.P., Christopher Boltinghouse, R. Seth Williams, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of April, 2016, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Complaint/Petition in Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
134 A.3d 447
Florence MASON, Petitioner v. Hon. Giovanni CAMPBELL, J.C.P., Christopher Boltinghouse, R. Seth Williams, Respondents.
No. 19 EM 2016.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 6, 2016.
